The user gathers chakra from their stomach and spews a small ball of fire. The required hand seals needed for this technique have varied; Kawaki's first use required one hand seal (two in the anime) however, later in the anime, using four hand seals were used.<ref name="BE230" />

== Trivia ==
* In the manga, Kawaki's first usage of the technique was shown by him using a [[Lightning Release]] hand seal rather than Fire Release.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 53, page 25</ref>
